titleStmt.title: The curtezan unmasked: or, The whoredomes of Jezebel painted to the life. With antidotes against them; or heavenly julips to cool men in the fevor of lust. / Prescribed by a spiritual physician.
titleStmt.author: Spiritual physician.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Marsh, at the Princes Arms in Chancery-Lane.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Toronto Library.
